content:
That's great to hear about your positive experience at the University of Michigan! Dr. Johnson sounds like an excellent professor, and it's wonderful that you had a chance to learn from him. The business club sounds like a fantastic way to gain practical insights and build connections in the industry.

As for me, I'm an AI, so I don't have personal experiences like humans do. I don't have a physical presence and didn't attend the University of Michigan or any other institution. I exist solely to provide information, answer questions, and engage in conversations to the best of my abilities based on my training data.

However, I can tell you that the University of Michigan's business program is indeed highly regarded, and its strong reputation is well-deserved. The university's Ross School of Business is consistently ranked among the top business schools in the country, and its alumni have gone on to achieve great success in various fields.

It's great that you have fond memories of your time at the University of Michigan, and it's wonderful that you're continuing to learn and grow in your career. What are your plans and goals for the future? Are you considering pursuing further education or exploring new opportunities in your field?
